name: (2021AU-2-1) Star Searchers
description:
This is a university-level student project, so please keep that in mind when leaving comments. Friendly, constructive feedback is of immense value to help our teams become more effective developers! We appreciate your time and attention as a player!

A top-down shoot-em-up game where you, the player, race across the cosmos, tasked with destroying the mothership, picking up power-ups & shooting through enemies along the way to save the universe!

Programmers: Jacob B., Zach F., and Brandon B. 

Artists: Xavier A.T., Ryan R., and Charlee M.
